data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Modules for the Apache configuration files are too generic for the
    task of parsing, and managing the directives AddDescription
    available in .htaccess

    This module is used for repository website like http://madchat.org
    where there are more than 2000 directives to manage (add, remove,
    rename, etc).
